posts.post_title: Wtb: winner of wolverine cobb at heritage
posts.post_content: If anyone wants to make  quick flip and owns the card please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] - thanks!

i was looking at this as well, but got other fish to fry. 
I noticed he has it for offer on Heritage for 19,800.  (final w/bp was 13,200)
